meanings: (존재나 가치를 알아주지 않다) ignore, disregard, neglect, pass over
disregard (for rules), neglect (of consequences), 무시하다 disregard, ignore, neglect, bypass, take no notice of, set (the rules) at naught, leave (a thing) out of account
turn a deaf ear to sb's advice
take[pay] no heed to sb's advice

vlive.korean: [이때, 어마 무시한 대결 상대의 등장!] [At that time, a great component enters!] View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 9부_ep.1 아침을 깨우는 모닝엔젤의 정체?! (ft.벌칙)
vlive.english: [At that time, a great component enters!]

vlive.korean: [현역 아이돌의 어마 무시한 TIP 대기 중] MC들이 또 엄청난 걸 준비했습니다. the MCs have prepared something grand. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라 4화> 동시 생중계
vlive.english: the MCs have prepared something grand.

vlive.korean: 무시한 적 없어. I never disregarded you. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] ASTRO X SUITS KNIGHTS - 아스트로의 정장방!
갔는데 저를 무시한 거죠. So I went, but they ignored me. 듣기 View video CNBLUE : [신데렐라와 네 명의 기사] 심쿵 유발 팬미팅
vlive.english: So I went, but they ignored me.

vlive.korean: 아닌데 난 무시한 소리 아니야. No~ It was an insult at all. 듣기 View video B1A4 : 산들과 꽃꽂이를 배워봅시다
vlive.english: No~ It was an insult at all.
